```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(clubpro)
```

```{r set_palette}
palette(c("#0073C2", "#EFC000", "#868686"))
```

```{r model_jellyfish}
mod <- club(width ~ location, data = jellyfish)
```

```{r summary_jelyfish}
summary(mod)
```

```{r plot_jellyfish}
plot(mod)
```

```{r plot_csi, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
mod_csi <- csi(mod)
plot(mod_csi)
```

```{r predict_jellyfish}
predict(mod)
```

```{r plot_predictions, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
plot(predict(mod))
```

```{r accuracy_jellyfish}
accuracy(mod)
```

```{r plot_accuracy, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
plot(accuracy(mod))
```

```{r pcc_jellyfish}
pcc(mod)
```

```{r cval_jellyfish}
cval(mod)
```

```{r plot_cval_dist}
plot(pcc_replicates(mod))
```
